sentence.Network_en: They learn new roles and unlearn old ones.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们学习新的角色，抛却旧的角色。

sentence.Network_en: You'll have to unlearn all the bad habits you learned with your last piano teacher.
sentence.Network_cn: 你必须丢掉你的前任钢琴老师所教的一切坏习惯。

sentence.Network_en: Companies need to learn how to unlearn , to slough off yesterday's wisdom.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司要学会怎样放弃,要勇于抛弃昨日的成就.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 小学英语不规则过去式_百度知道 ... unlay 松开 unlearn 忘却 unmake 恢复原状.
...单向抑或双向，不论成事与否）却勾起了几许早应割舍和忘掉（unlearn）的回忆，就是那潜意识中备受抑制和约束（inhibition）的 …
魔兽世界单机版秘籍口令（巫妖王版）_百度知道 ... .resettalents 初始化天赋 .unlearn 忘记技能 .learnskill 学习技能.

1. 非习得动机unlearned behavior 非习得行为unlearned response 非习得反应

entry.tran: 设法忘记（或忽略）；抛掉（以前的错误想法、坏习惯等）
entry.def: If you unlearn something that you have learned, you try to forget it or ignore it, often because it is wrong or it is having a bad influence on you.

example.ex: They learn new roles and unlearn old ones...
example.tran: 他们学习新的角色，抛却旧的角色。

example.ex: Before you know it, you will have unlearned the debt habit.
example.tran: 很快你就会摒弃欠债的习惯。

means.word_mean: 1. try to forget; put out of one's memory or knowledge
2. discard something previously learnt, like an old habit

auth_sentence.content: You are still young. You can unlearn a lot.
auth_sentence.res_content: You are still young. You can unlearn a lot.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You are still young. You can unlearn a lot.

auth_sentence.content: There is nothing a scientist hates to do more than unlearn what was thought to be well established.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is nothing a scientist hates to do more than unlearn what was thought to be well established.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is nothing a scientist hates to do more than unlearn what was thought to be well established.

auth_sentence.content: Exercises may include massage or relaxation; partners begin to unlearn fear and to take pleasure in contact.
